author: Will McClelland
description:
Epic fantasy fans, rejoice! Gourav Mohanty marches back to the world of Aryavrat in Dance of Shadows, the second book in his impressive debut series, The Raag of Rta. If you haven’t read Sons of Darkness yet, I highly recommend it. The series is uniquely based on the Mahabharata, an Indian Vedic epic poem, and […]

The post REVIEW: Dance of Shadows by Gourav Mohanty appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Dance of Shadows by Gourav Mohanty
